CancelAuditMitigationActionsTask.name: CancelAuditMitigationActionsTask
CancelAuditMitigationActionsTask.description: Cancels a mitigation action task that is in progress.

Defines a dimension that can be used to to limit the scope of a metric used in a security
                                                profile.

Creates a 2048 bit RSA key pair and issues an X.509 certificate using the issued public
                                                key.

CreateMitigationAction.name: CreateMitigationAction
CreateMitigationAction.description: Defines an action that can be applied to audit findings by using StartAuditMitigationActionsTask.

Gets information about a single audit finding. Properties include the reason for noncompliance,

Lists the Device Defender security profile violations discovered during the given

RegisterCertificate.description: Registers a device certificate with AWS IoT.

RemoveThingFromBillingGroup.description: Removes thing from the specified billing group.

RemoveThingFromThingGroup.description: Removes thing from the specified thing group.

SetDefaultAuthorizer.name: SetDefaultAuthorizer
SetDefaultAuthorizer.description:
Sets the default authorizer. This will be used if a websocket connection is made without
                                                specifying an authorizer.

SetDefaultPolicyVersion.name: SetDefaultPolicyVersion
SetDefaultPolicyVersion.description:
Sets the specified version of the specified policy as the policy's default (operative)
                                                version.

StartAuditMitigationActionsTask.name: StartAuditMitigationActionsTask
StartAuditMitigationActionsTask.description: Starts a task that applies a set of mitigation actions to the specified target.

TestAuthorization.description: Test the policies evaluation for group policies

TestInvokeAuthorizer.description: Invoke the specified custom authorizer for testing purposes.

TransferCertificate.name: TransferCertificate

UpdateAccountAuditConfiguration.description: Configures or reconfigures the Device Defender audit settings for this account.

UpdateDimension.name: UpdateDimension
UpdateDimension.description: Updates the definition for a dimension.

UpdateMitigationAction.name: UpdateMitigationAction
UpdateMitigationAction.description: Updates the definition for the specified mitigation action.

Updates a scheduled audit, including what checks are performed and how often the audit

UpdateSecurityProfile.description: Updates a Device Defender security profile.

UpdateStream.name: UpdateStream
